name: Jiu-Jitsu
description: A fighting style originating from judo, it is the style of fighting and efficiently moving on the ground.

name: Wrestling
description: Although many do not consider this a martial art, it is considered the most important of the three, as it allows one to dectate if the fight takes place standing or on the ground

name: Muay-Thai
description: A striking martial art orignating in Thailand, used by most mma practitioners as a primary stand-up martial arts style.
